divs: sighting detailsi was waking home from my grandmothers place at or around 11:30 pm, it was cloudy where i can't even see the moon, and my house was only seven houses up the street, i was walking while looking down on the road i'm walking on, then all of a sudden, i saw my shadow in an enclosed circle of blue light, i looked up, and saw this light as big as a basket ball then slowly going upwards until it disappeared, this seem to last only a few seconds, but in fact it was actually two and a half hours, because by the time i reached home, everyone was sleeping, i was surprised to see everyone asleep already, i looked at the clock and was surprised to see the time is 2 am,....i have no recollection of the 2 1\2 hours that passed.
trends: There have been 47 other sightings in Montreal
There were no other sightings in Montreal on or around September 25th 1989
